You and Rah are going to sneak on this boat while the people are away. Something is going on hear, and you and Rah are going to get to the bottom of it.

Rah and you walk on the wood leading up to the boat, and cautiously step over the side of the boat. You two walk across the boat's deck to the door leading into the boats mysterious interior. Rah reaches out his hand, attempting to open the door. It opens. You and Rah tip-toe into the boat's upper room, and what you two see is disturbing.

Inside the boat, there's some stairs leading below deck, and a desk with a large, cluttered bulletin board above it. A large paper map of Chegckle is on the bulletin board, with lots of red X's drawn on it. The stairs leading downward have strange turcoise stains on them You also see a set of, what appears to be fireworks next to the desk. The fireworks seem to be hooked up to various cans of gas labeled things like 'flammable,' 'corosive,' 'toxic,' and 'biohazard.'

"Wait... remember how those workers were talking about a distraction, and fireworks? Look, these fireworks are attached to these cans of gas..." Rah says, thinking.

Then you and Rah hear the sound of footsteps. The sound of muffled talking comes into earshot along with the growing louder footsteps.

Go below deck Get off the boat
